de.affect.manage

Class AffectManager.InterfaceHolder

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.affect.manage.AffectManager.InterfaceHolder
  • Enclosing class:
    AffectManager

    public class AffectManager.InterfaceHolder
extends java.lang.Object
    InterfaceHolder class provides methods for accessing some data stored/handled by an AffectManager.
